deployHistory.changes: PageSpeed API now uses FREE tier - no API key required, live SEO analysis works
All admin pages now dynamic: index, competitors, rankings load from API
Admin index.html now fetches all data from API - no hardcoded data
Fixed admin ai-config.js to use production API, added tasks/analytics endpoints
Removed hardcoded version fallback, consolidated to single version.json, API endpoints working
Fixed invalid JSON (trailing comma) that prevented version display in footer
Moved API functions to root /api folder for Vercel serverless support
Vercel v2 config with explicit builds and routes for API functions
Fixed API routing in vercel.json, removed hardcoded API keys for security
Test deployment - verifying Vercel auto-deploy from GitHub
Fixed admin page to work with API endpoints and display real data
Auto-setup page and fixed vercel.json - APIs work automatically with fallback key
Proper architecture: Serverless API functions - no more client-side API key issues
Admin API integration with Google Gemini - secure implementation using environment variables only
Fix admin microsites with real domain URLs + complete system test
